--CREATE MASTER KEY ENCRYPTION BY PASSWORD ='Dp@mbo123456';

CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL [ADLS_credential1]
WITH IDENTITY='SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE',  
SECRET = '?sv=2020-02-10&ss=bfqt&srt=sco&sp=rwdlacupx&se=2021-06-30T20:02:57Z&st=2021-06-01T12:02:57Z&spr=https&sig=7JRTgRQtq6g029Kr84qi%2FEmNXJ4iudpyVLSFXun1Hfc%3D'
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE AzureDataLakeStore1
WITH
  -- Please note the abfss endpoint when your account has secure transfer enabled
  ( LOCATION = 'abfss://blobtest@pomboadlsgen22.dfs.core.windows.net' ,
    CREDENTIAL = ADLS_credential1 
  ) ;


CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT skipHeader_CSV
WITH (FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT,
      FORMAT_OPTIONS(
          FIELD_TERMINATOR = ',',
          STRING_DELIMITER = '"',
          FIRST_ROW = 1, 
          USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = True)
)


CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE ClickStream1 (
    x varchar(50)
)
WITH (
        LOCATION='SQL1.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = AzureDataLakeStore1,
        FILE_FORMAT = skipHeader_CSV
    )
;


select * from ClickStream1;



select *
from my_test_sql.dbo.y
